This shinjutsu allows the user to reflect any incoming attacks back at the opponent. Even the thought of attacking the user will reflect the predicted move back at the attacker. The stronger the attacker's killing intent, the more powerful the reflection will be.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 59, page 38</ref> In order to activate this ability, Daemon's palms must be touching another person, which extends the ability to them as well.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 75, page 3</ref>
